testcase.classname: Validate API key, GetWeather, Register Stations
testcase.name: Get Weather
testcase.system-out: Given User hits the weather API URI.........................................passed When getWeather API finds valid API key and valid location..................passed Then getWeather API provides the weather details............................passed

testcase.classname: Validate API key, GetWeather, Register Stations
testcase.name: Register New Station
testcase.system-out: Given User hits the registerStation API URI.................................passed When API finds valid API key and valid post request.........................passed Then registerStation API registers the station details and respond with unique ID.passed

testcase.classname: Validate API key, GetWeather, Register Stations
testcase.name: Invalid API Key
testcase.system-out: Given User hits the weather API URI without API key.........................passed When getWeather API rejects the request.....................................passed And getWeather API returns authentication error.............................passed
